title: Change Policy Dividend Option
description: A participating whole life policyholder wants to change their dividend option from 'Paid in Cash' to 'Purchase Paid-Up Additions'.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and their current dividend option.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the policy and confirms the current dividend election.

tasks.description: Explain the different dividend options, especially 'Purchase Paid-Up Additions'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains how paid-up additions work to increase the death benefit and cash value.

tasks.description: Update the dividend option on the policy as requested.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the dividend election in the system.
